patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,1 +1,27 @@
-// TODO Implement this library.
\ No newline at end of file
+class Book {
+  final String id;                // Unique ID for each book
+  final String title;             // Title of the book
+  final String author;            // Author of the book
+  final String filePath;          // Path to the book file (e.g., EPUB, PDF)
+  final String genre;             // Genre or folder this book belongs to
+  final String coverImagePath;    // Path to cover image (optional)
+  final String description;       // Short description or summary of the book
+  final DateTime addedDate;       // Date the book was added to the library
+  final int currentPage;          // Last page read (to track progress)
+  final int totalPages;           // Total pages in the book (optional)
+  final String? parentFolder;     // Parent folder or sub-folder information
+
+  Book({
+    required this.id,
+    required this.title,
+    required this.author,
+    required this.filePath,
+    required this.genre,
+    this.coverImagePath = 'assets/book_cover_placeholder.png', // Default placeholder image
+    this.description = '',
+    required this.addedDate,
+    this.currentPage = 0,
+    this.totalPages = 0,
+    this.parentFolder,
+  });
+}

-class Book {

+import 'package:hive/hive.dart';
 
+part 'book.g.dart';
+
+@HiveType(typeId: 0)
+class Book extends HiveObject {
+  @HiveField(0)
+  String id;
+
+  @HiveField(1)
+  String title;
+
+  @HiveField(2)
+  String author;
+
+  @HiveField(3)
+  String filePath;
+

+

+  DateTime addedDate;
+

+  int currentPage;
+
+  @HiveField(9)
+  int totalPages;
+
+  @HiveField(10)
+  String? parentFolder;
+
